title: Irish History and Politics (Kindle Books)
description:
My collection of books on Irish history, politics and current affairs. All are in mobi format unless stated otherwise.  The collection is listed below:

A History of Ireland in 250 Episodes - Jonathon Bardon

A Secret History of the IRA - Ed Moloney (maps included in supplementary pdf file)

A Very British Jihad - Paul Larkin

Afterlives - Richard O'Rawe

Armed Struggle - Richard English

The Battle for Cork (July-August 1922) - John Borgonovo 

Bertie Ahern and the Drumcondra Mafia - Michael Clifford, Shane Coleman

Bertie Ahern: Power and Money - Colm Keena

Big Fellow, Long Fellow - Ryle T. Dwyer

Crisis and Decline: The Fate of Southern Unionists - R.B. McDowell

Cruel Britannia: A Secret History of Torture - Ian Cobain

Easter 1916: The Irish Rebellion - Charles Townshend

Enigma: A New Life of Charles Stewart Parnell - Paul Bew

Exodus: The Emigration of Southern Irish Protestants During the Irish War of Independence and the Civil War (PDF) - Andy Bielenberg

Fatal Path - Ronan Fanning

The Flame and the Candle: War in Mayo 1919-1924 - Dominic Price

The Frontman: Bono (In the Name of Power) - Harry Browne

The Green Flag: A History of Irish Nationalism - Robert Kee

Into the Dark - Johnston Brown

Irish Freedom - Richard English

The Irish Revolution  - Marie Coleman

The Irish Revolution in Sligo, 1912-23 - Michael Farry

Is Ireland Really the Role Model for Austerity? (PDF) - Stephen Kinsella

The Isles - Norman Davies

The Lost Revolution - Brian Hanley, Scott Millar

James Connolly (16 Lives) - Lorcan Collins

Lethal Allies: British Collusion in Ireland - Anne Cadwallader

Making Sense of the Troubles - David McKittrick

Massacre in West Cork: The Dunmanway and Ballygroman Killings - Barry Keane

Michael Collins and the Civil War - Ryle T. Dwyer

Michael Collins: The Man Who Won The War - Ryle T. Dwyer

Myth and the Irish State - John Regan

Northern Ireland: A Very Short Introduction - Marc Mulholland
Occasions of Sin: Sex and Society in Modern Ireland -Diarmaid Ferriter

Peace After The Final Battle: The Story of the Irish Revolution, 1912-24 - John Dorney

Policing Twentieth Century Ireland: A History of An Garda Siochana - Vicky Conway

Political corruption in Ireland - ELAINE A. BYRNE

The Propaganda of Peace - Greg McLaughlin, Stephen Baker

Rebels: Voices from the Easter Rising - Fearghal McGarry

The Republic: The Fight for Irish Independence - Charles Townshend

The Resurrection of Ireland: The Sinn Fein Party, 1916-23 - Michael Laffan

Ship of Fools - Fintan O'Toole

Sins of the Father - Conor McCabe

Stakeknife: Britain's Secret Agents in Ireland - Martin Ingram, Greg Harkin

The Story Of The Tudor Conquest of Ireland, 1541-1603 - John Dorney

Terror in Ireland, 1916-1923 - David Fitzpatrick et al.

The Transformation Of Ireland, 1900-2000 - Diarmaid Ferriter

The Year of Disappearances - Gerard Murphy

Understanding Ireland's Economic Crisis - Stephen Kinsella, Anthony Leddin et al.

Up the Republic! (Towards a New Ireland) - Fintan O'Toole et al.

Voices from the Grave - Ed Moloney
